content: size finished circumference 18 20 22 width 5 materials manos del uruguay wool clasica 100% wool approx 100g 138 yds 1 skip shown in 25 shale us 10/6mm ndls or size to obtain gauge 2 st holders gauge 16 sts and 20 row = 4 in stockinette st headband co 30 sts work in rib patt a as follows row 1 rs sl 1 knitwise k3 p2 k3 to last st k1 row 2 sl 1 purlwise p3 k2 p3 to last st p1 repeat row 1 and 2 until piece measures 7¾ 8¾ 9¾ ending having just worked a rs row next row ws work 15 sts in patt as established these will be referred to as the left sts put rem 15 sts on holder the right sts turn and cont to work 13 more row on left sts in patt as follows rs row sl 1 knitwise then work rem sts as they appear ws row sl 1 purlwise work rem sts as they appear break yarn and put sts on second holder replace right sts on ndl and rejoin yarn with ws facing work 14 row in patt as follows rs row sl 1 knitwise then work rem sts as they appear ws row sl 1 purlwise then work rem sts as they appear end having worked a rs row next row ws work 15 right sts then cont with left sts from holder be- ing careful to work them on the ws row seen from the rs of the work the right sts should now be twisted over the left sts and all 30 sts are back on the ndl cont working in rib patt a as established until headband measures 18 20 22 ending having worked a ws row bobble in rib pattern finishing sew co edge to bobble edge to close headband weave in ends
